topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Step 2 - Download the Denver Installation Packages

titlealts.searchtitle: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade Installation Prerequisites

body.section:
In a browser, navigate to Helion Download Network(HDN).
Click Sign In to log in using your account.
After signing in, click the Downloads link in the menu on the left side of the page.
Click the Downloads tab and locate the following download.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0.0 AVS Installation files for the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade Tahoe, Memphis, and Sacramento deployments. This link will download the hcg2_kvm_avs.tar.gz file.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 AVS Checksum. The SHA256 checksum for HP Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 VRS. This link will download the hcg2_kvm_avs.tar.gz.sha256 file.
Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 AVS Signature. The signature file for HP Helion Carrier Grade 2.0 VRS. This link will download the hcg2_kvm_avs.tar.gz.sig file.
GPG Keys to Verify Signature Files The public keys for HP Helion Carrier Grade 2.0.
Note: When downloading installation files, always download and verify the signature file before installing.

section.title: Verify the downloaded checksums
section.p: You should also use a checksum verification tool, such as sha256sum, which should come installed with Ubuntu.

ol.li: Run the checksum tool against the download package:sha256sum <path-to-file>/hcg2_kvm_avs.tar

Compare the output of the checksum tool to the download checksum file. sha256sum.exe hcg2_kvm_esx_ironic_vrs.tar 4ba8ce74525332ed732ed2d6adeca5692e31ef5ee089074ec25bf0b3d7be1882 hcg2_kvm_avs.tar.gzNote that the checksum file contains the date that the file was generated, the checksum string, and the name of the file that was used, similar to the following:Fri Dec 4 12:22:40 PST 2015 4ba8ce74525332ed732ed2d6adeca5692e31ef5ee089074ec25bf0b3d7be1882 hcg2_kvm_avs.tar.gz
